HediffDef.label: Bed wetter
HediffDef.description: Often wets the bed while being asleep. Needs protection at night.

HediffDef.label: Bladder infection
HediffDef.description: A temporary infection of the bladder. They will have great trouble making it to the toilet in time. Accidents might occure randomly and/or at night.

HediffDef.label: Weak bladder
HediffDef.description: A very weak bladder. Accidents might occure randomly and/or at night.

HediffDef.label: incontinent
HediffDef.description: No control over their bladder at all. Diapers are strongly recommended.
